Text:
Get free Amiga ADF game files here:

http://www.accelerated-ideas.com/AmigaEmulatorZone/aiAmigaEmulatorZone_Roms.aspx

Enjoy and long live the Amiga!!

Sorry about not hosting the file for a while but I was unaware that I finally managed to upload the torrent. It's being seeded approx 10am-11pm GMT all through the week if anyone feels like leeching. Please keep seeding to help keep the Amiga alive ;)
